Direct message the job poster from Harnham
Liam Landy
Recruitment Consultant | Specialist in recruiting within Marketing Analytics, Product Analytics & Data Science
Digital Analytics ManagerLos Angeles, CA130,000-150,000 base + bonusJoin this leading consumer goods company as their Digital Analytics Manager. In this role, you will manage digital analytics by running tests and creating dashboards and reports. Present insights and recommendations directly to senior stakeholders in this high-visibility role for this data-driven company.ROLE OVERVIEWPerform in-depth analysis and recommendations using various digital analytics tools to drive business strategiesDevelop and maintain dashboards and reports for senior stakeholdersOversee the company's existing relationship with an ad agency and manage individuals on this teamPresent actionable insights to Senior LeadershipDesign and run AB and Multivariate testsSKILLS AND EXPERIENCEBachelor's degree4 years plus experience in a similar roleExperience with Google tools such as GA, GA360, GMP, and GDSData visualization experience is Tableau, Domo, Looker, PowerBI, or GDSExperience with A/B and Multivariate testingExperience with social media measurement platforms (Facebook Insights, YouTube Analytics, Etc.)Experience with Paid Media Platforms such as 360 or Trade DeskAbility to write queries in a database such as SQLAbility to analyze large sets of marketing data and provide actionable insights to drive business forwardStrong communication skills for people management and stakeholder interactions
Show more
